metadata.title: CVE-2022-3483 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.1 before 15.3.5, all versions starting from 15.4 before15.4.4, all versions starting from 15.5 before 15.5.2. A maliciousmaintainer could exfiltrate a Datadog integration's access token bymodifying the integration URL such that authenticated requests are sent toan attacker controlled server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
